oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist Name Typography for the Country Music Hall of Fame Series
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: artistic concepts; Country Music Hall of Fame Series; typography;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (black on white) featuring the names of Jimmie Davis, Kitty Wells, Bill Monroe, Ernest Tubb, Loretta Lynn, Jimmy Martin, Red Foley, and Webb Pierce. The typography featured on this poster was created for linocut designs for the Country Music Hall of Fame Series, a CD series released by MCA Records in collaboration with the Country Music Foundation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Sherraden;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: posters; proofs (prints by function); window cards;
